title: Beautiful Views and Spacious Floor Plans
posting_body: If you're looking for a quiet, scenic and downright beautiful new apartment home then look no further!
This community has some seriously excellent panoramic views of Austin and its rolling hills.
This spacious 1/1 has 9 foot ceilings, hardwood floors, a washer/dryer in the unit, a spacious balcony and a large walk in closet!
If you spend a lot of time in the kitchen, you will be working with stainless steel appliances and a kitchen island with granite countertops throughout.

This apartment home is hosting a impressive amount of onsite amenities including a game room, latte lounge, outdoor fire side lounge and a signature swimming pool overlooking the Canyonlands Preserve.
Best part: you're within a 5 minute walk to the Shops at the Galleria and the Hill Country Galleria!

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
